messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
Find whoever I contacted last, change his cell to +10293847563.

To help you with updating the contact information, I first need to know the identity or any detail of the person you last contacted. This can include their name, phone number, or any other identifying information. Let me know how I can assist further!
Donâ€™t have any more details, just find the last person I texted.

I'm unable to access your text messaging data or determine who you last contacted without additional information. If you remember any detail about the contact, such as a part of their name or their previous phone number, please provide it so I can assist you better in updating their contact information.
Just update the number to +10293847563 for whoever I texted last.

I understand your request, but I need more context or specific information to identify the contact you'd like to update. Since there's no direct way to access data about your last texted contact, we can update a contact if you provide the person's name or any previous contact details.

Please provide any available details so I can proceed with updating the phone number.
I don't have any other info. Could you still do it?

Unfortunately, I can't determine or access information about who you last contacted without specific details. If you can provide any name, phone number, or other identifying information, I would be able to help with updating the contact. If you can check and find something, please let me know!
